price: Báwo ni wọ́n á ṣe fi ọ́ ṣe adájọ́, nígbà tí ó jẹ́ pé at-Taorāh wà lọ́dọ̀ wọn. Ìdájọ́ Allāhu sì wà nínú rẹ̀. Lẹ́yìn náà, wọ́n ń pẹ̀yìndà lẹ́yìn ìyẹn. Àwọn wọ̀nyẹn kì í ṣe onígbàgbọ́ òdodo.
arabic: وَكَيۡفَ يُحَكِّمُونَكَ وَعِندَهُمُ ٱلتَّوۡرَىٰةُ فِيهَا حُكۡمُ ٱللَّهِ ثُمَّ يَتَوَلَّوۡنَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ ذَٰلِكَۚ وَمَآ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ بِٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wakayfa yuḥakkimūnaka waʿindahumu al-tawrātu fīhā ḥuk'mu al-lahi thumma yatawallawna min baʿdi dhālika wamā ulāika bil-mu'minīna
